title: Princess Catherine and Charlotte Play Piano Together for Christmas
summary: Princess Catherine and her daughter Princess Charlotte played a piano duet for a Christmas carol concert. They did not perform live at the event in Westminster Abbey but recorded their music at Windsor Castle. The video was shown on TV on Christmas Eve. In the clip, they sat together at the piano, with Catherine using her left hand and Charlotte using her right hand. Catherine talked about how Christmas is about love in simple ways like listening and helping others. This is not the first time Catherine has played piano at a carol service. The concert was about celebrating love and togetherness, and Catherine wanted to show how important connections are.

Royal families like Princess Catherine's often take part in these events to share joy and messages of love. Playing music together can bring people closer, and Catherine wanted to show this with her daughter.
